messages.title: Broken F-Droid Pipeline
messages.message:
Hi everyone!

Our F-Droid pipeline is currently broken for an unknown reason. This is why there have been no recent updates. We are working with the F-Droid team to resolve the issue as soon as possible.

In the meantime, you can download the F-Droid version (non-F-Droid build) from the official GitLab release below. Thank you.

messages.title: Temporary GitHub Repository Outage
messages.message:
Hi everyone! 

Our GitHub repository is currently unavailable due to an automated flagging issue (similar to what happened during the last release). This means the latest release distribution on GitHub will be delayed by about 2 days.

 Please use the gitlab mirror to refer to the source code.

 F-Droid users however are not affected since builds are sourced from GitLab.

We appreciate your patience and support while GitHub is being restored. üôè

messages.title: üî• Welcome to Fetchify 1.8.148!
messages.message:
You've just unlocked v1.8.148 - our most ambitious upgrade yet. üöÄ

It's a whole new experience:
üåç Habla en 11 idiomas - Fetchify now talks like you! Check out the app language selection in Settings.
ü§ñ On-device AI - The most awaited feature is here! Try the gemma-3n-e2b model: go to AI Settings to download and load it. It's impressive‚Ä¶
üîî Notifications that do more - with images and a unified screen on the home page where you can see all active and past reminders.
üßπ One-tap media cleanup - remove all corrupt or deleted media in one click.

You're among the first to wield these tools. Go explore, and if you love this update, support the project! üíô 

 With Love, 
 Team Fetchify
